title: Having 2000 ping and gettting reported for it
body: hey i was wondering i just played a game were i had 2000 ping and i couldnt do anything about it and i had it for the whole game and everyone was threatening to report me so if they did my question is while i be punished for it, as it wasnt my fault i couldnt fix the issue i tried restarting modem but nothing was helping

replies.body: You won't be punished no. Riot knows that these sort of issues happen from time to time so the occasional lag or dc won't result in any punishment :)
